stories.text:
Hi guys

I spent my spare time in 2020 and 2021 learning how to put together and operate a backyard observatory.

The linked pic is a composite made with the image composite editor from microsoft research. The input to the compositor looks like this:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KLd-U1lYgnY

I found that this process is a lot faster than creating sequences in sequence generator pro or sharpcap, though it does leave in visible sensor noise that would otherwise be removed by the stacking process.

I've yet to find a decent deconvolver, though i'm probably going to learn some openCV for that.
stories.title: Show HN: I Took a Picture of the Moon

stories.text: Lots of spam comments are posted to blogs with links handled as nofollow in comments: why? Is this out of date advice novice spammers get from their peers? Do the spammers get any SEO or other benefits?
